name: GenesisTools Plugins
description: Plugins for GenesisTools CLI development and management

plugins.name: genesis-tools
plugins.description: Skills and utilities for working with GenesisTools CLI toolkit. Provides guidance for discovering, executing, and troubleshooting genesis tools with integrated workflow support.

commands.name: setup
commands.description: Set up GenesisTools to make the 'tools' command function globally

skills.name: azure-devops
skills.description: Interact with Azure DevOps work items, queries, and dashboards. Fetch, analyze, and manage work items using the tools azure-devops CLI
